text: Motshegetsi "Motsi" Mabuse (born 11 April 1981) is a German-South African dancer. ==Works== She has appeared on Let's Dance, the German version of Strictly Come Dancing, originally appearing as a professional dancer. But very later became a judge on the show. On 22 July 2019, it was announced that Mabuse would replace Darcey Bussell as a judge on series 17 of Strictly Come Dancing. Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Dancers
title: Motsi Mabuse
